items.title: Demo case 1
items.prompt_zh: 保持主体特征不变，将人物置于室内咖啡馆，阳光窗景，暖色调。
items.prompt_en: Keep subject features unchanged; place the person in a cozy indoor cafe with bright window light and warm tones.
items.author: nanobananaguide.ai
